snippet: SLATER--Selma. High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Selma Slater. We extend our deepest sympathy to her family. Robert D. Lang, President Harvey Karofsky, Secretary 1/3...
lead_paragraph: SLATER--Selma. High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Selma Slater. We extend our deepest sympathy to her family. Robert D. Lang, President Harvey Karofsky, Secretary 1/3
